title: Drawing, "Ceiling Design: Roman Ambassador Ask the Sabine Numa Pompilius to Reign over Rome, Sala di Numa Pompilio, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1802–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: In pen and brown ink, lower center: Li ambasatori romani invitano numa a/ regno
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three ambassadors urge Numa, seated in his room, to go with them. Boy carries diadem toward Numa; Romans kneel at left with crowd filling room. In black chalk, upper center, part of underdrawing of unclear subject matter.
